Are you thinking about finishing your basement, or remodelling your kitchen or bathroom?

If you want the quality, design, and expertise that only come with experience, Trim Tile and Stone is right for you.

## Why choose Trim Tile and Stone?

If you're thinking about renovations, then you are probably already thinking about one of your biggest hurdles: budget. While many contractors will tell you what your budget needs to be, we respect your circumstances, and will work within your budget.

When it comes to design, we work with you to help you plan out the most valuable use of your space, but we don't push our own opinions on youâ€”once again, we respect your ability to make up your own mind.

## Offerings

We specialize in basements, kitchens, bathrooms, and more. For more information see our [services page](/services).

## CTA section

General inquiries are welcome any time, and we offer free estimates across the GTA. Get in touch by phone or email on our [contact page](/contact).
